mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user LEFT OUTER JOIN sns_user ON user.id = sns_user.user_id WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT user_id FROM sns_user WHERE sns_id = #{snsId} AND client_name = #{clientName}) `User_id` INNER JOIN `user` ON `user`.id = `User_id`.user_id INNER JOIN `sns_user` ON `sns_user`.user_id = `User_id`.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_id, user_id, imp_uid, merchant_uid, order_name, order_price, order_date, buyer_name, buyer_addr, buyer_tel) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{impUid}, #{merchantUid}, #{orderName}, #{orderPrice}, null, #{buyerName}, #{buyerAddr}, #{buyerTel})
INSERT INTO order_detail (order_detail_id, order_id, product_id, quantity, order_price) VALUES (#{orderDetailId}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{orderPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT *, order_detail_id as orderDetailId, product.name FROM order_detail JOIN product on order_detail.product_id = product.product_id WHERE order_detail.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, name, postcode, road_address, detail_address, tel, email, nickname) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{nickname})
INSERT INTO sns_user(user_id, sns_id, client_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{snsId}, #{clientName})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{realName}, postcode = #{postcode}, road_address = #{roadAddress}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname} WHERE id = #{id} ### 비밀번호 업데이트는 별도로 해주고 있다
